question: Can I refinance my home loan if my home value is $350,000 and remaining mortgage is $250,000 with a credit score of 720?
true_answer: Yes, you can refinance with a credit score of 720. Your loan-to-value ratio is 71%, which is acceptable.

Yes, you can refinance with a credit score of 720. Your loan-to-value ratio is 71%, which is acceptable. Current interest rates are around 3.5% to 4%.
